Reset the KVP parser so that the autodetected <<xm_kvp_config_keyquotechar,KeyQuoteChar>>, <<xm_kvp_config_valuequotechar,ValueQuoteChar>>, <<xm_kvp_config_kvdelimiter,KVDelimiter>>, and <<xm_kvp_config_kvpdelimiter,KVPDelimiter>> characters can be detected again.
